definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: She was 16 years old to enter the Chinese People's Liberation Army Art Academy, where he studied Li Shuangjiang.
sentences.chinese: 她16岁进入中国解放军艺术学院学习，师从李双江。

sentences.english: The Liberation Arm is the steel Great Wall of motherland.
sentences.chinese: 解放军是祖国的钢铁长城。

sentences.english: The PLA Air Force small test their skills in front of a firm footing.
sentences.chinese: 解放军空军小试身手，在前线站稳了脚跟。

sentences.english: First came the PLA men, then the people's militia.
sentences.chinese: 人民解放军走在前面，其次是民兵。

sentences.english: There are many Lei Fengs in PLA.
sentences.chinese: 解放军里有许多雷锋式人物。

sentences.english: On my way home. I met a P.
sentences.chinese: 在我回家的路上，我遇到了一位解放军。

sentences.english: Violence troops of People Liberal Troops sending to SiChuan has reached more than 0.13million .
sentences.chinese: 派往四川的人民解放军，武警部队达到十三万多。

sentences.english: The People's Liberation Army should recognize its failings and restore its prestige through its own efforts.
sentences.chinese: 我们解放军要有自知之明，要靠自己恢复名誉。

sentences.english: And the peoples liberation army this bridge maintenance task falls on the shoulders of the locks.
sentences.chinese: 而解放军这面维护大桥的任务就落在了锁头的肩上。

sentences.english: Shenzhen, the Chinese People’s Liberation Army’s naval destroyer, entered Tokyo Bay.
sentences.chinese: 中国人民解放军的深圳号驱逐舰进入了东京港。

sentences.english: Historically, conscription was the mainstay of PLA recruitment.
sentences.chinese: 历史上，义务兵一直是解放军的中流砥柱。

sentences.english: Three Rules of Discipline Eight Points for Attention is the People's Liberation Army regulations.
sentences.chinese: 三大纪律八项注意是中国人民解放军的法规。

sentences.english: PLA Navy to conduct live-ammunition drill in Yellow Sea.
sentences.chinese: 中国人民解放军海军在黄海进行实弹演习。

sentences.english: And she still got the picture of place troops on garrison duty of the liberation army inside cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 并且她还收到了教堂内解放军的布防图。

sentences.english: She has only two sons. They are both P. L. A. men.
sentences.chinese: 她只有两个儿子，他们都是解放军。

definition: Eighth Route Army, the larger of the two major Chinese communist forces fighting the Japanese in the Second Sino-Japanese War (1937-1945)
abbr. for 台灣海峽|台湾海峡, Taiwan Strait
